details.arabic_diacless: رب انى وهن العظم منى واشتعل الراس شيبا ولم اكنۢ بدعائك رب شقيا
details.arabic: رَبِّ اِنِّىۡ وَهَنَ الۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّىۡ وَاشۡتَعَلَ الرَّاۡسُ شَيۡبًا وَّلَمۡ اَكُنۡۢ بِدُعَائِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا
details.transliteration: rabbi innee wahana alAAathmuminnee washtaAAala arra/su shayban walam akunbiduAAa-ika rabbi shaqiyya
details.translations: "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened, and my head has filled with white, and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy.

details.arabic_diacless: وانى خفت الموالى من ورآءى وكانت امراتى عاقرا فهب لى من لدنك وليا
details.arabic: وَاِنِّىۡ خِفۡتُ الۡمَوَالِىَ مِنۡ وَّرَآءِىۡ وَكَانَتِ امۡرَاَتِىۡ عَاقِرًا فَهَبۡ لِىۡ مِنۡ لَّدُنۡكَ وَلِيًّا
details.transliteration: Wa-innee khiftu almawaliya min wara-eewakanati imraatee AAaqiran fahab lee min ladunkawaliyya
details.translations: And indeed, I fear the successors after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir

details.arabic_diacless: يرثنى ويرث من اٰل يعقوب ۖواجعله رب رضيا‏
details.arabic: يَّرِثُنِىۡ وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ اٰلِ يَعۡقُوۡبَ ۖوَاجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا‏
details.transliteration: Yarithunee wayarithu min ali yaAAqoobawajAAalhu rabbi radiyya
details.translations: Who will inherit me and inherit from the family of Jacob. And make him, my Lord, pleasing [to You]."
